text:
How can I use the `selectattr` with an HubDB ‘Multi Select’ field? can’t get it to work. `rows|selectattr('category',value='1')` is not working for me.
Tnx

How can I apply style changes to the current item in the loop?

Im fairly new to the HubSpot CMS and HubL so all help is welcome!

Thanks in advance.

You can use the `loop properties` to style the current item. So try adding `{{ loop.index }}` to your template.
To be more specific you can add `{{ name }}` to add the module or widget ID (module_XXXX / widget_XXXX).
So use this as a class `.item-{{ name }}-{{ loop.index }}`
Thank you for the help! Actually I got it work already, but appreciate your help!
<@UJLMJNX6G> sadly no, contact.owner givesme the id, but there's no object there, request for firstname comes blank
